Read Sample Metadata File

Read Sample Metadata File

readSampleMetadataFile(file, lanes = 1L)

Arguments

file

Metadata file. Supports CSV and XLSX file formats.
lanes

Optional. Number of lanes used to split the samples into technical replicates (_LXXX) suffix.

Value

data.frame.

Examples

# Demultiplexed
demultiplexed <- paste(
    "http://bcbiobase.seq.cloud",
    "sample_metadata",
    "demultiplexed.xlsx",
    sep = "/")
readSampleMetadataFile(demultiplexed) %>% glimpse()
#> Reading demultiplexed.xlsx
#> Observations: 4
#> Variables: 5
#> $ sampleID    <fct> sample_1, sample_2, sample_3, sample_4
#> $ sampleName  <fct> sample 1, sample 2, sample 3, sample 4
#> $ description <fct> sample 1, sample 2, sample 3, sample 4
#> $ fileName    <fct> sample1_R1.fastq.gz, sample2_R1.fastq.gz, sample3_R1.fa...
#> $ genotype    <fct> wildtype, wildtype, mutant, mutant

# Multiplexed (e.g. inDrop single-cell RNA-seq)
multiplexed <- paste(
    "http://bcbiobase.seq.cloud",
    "sample_metadata",
    "multiplexed.xlsx",
    sep = "/")
readSampleMetadataFile(multiplexed) %>% glimpse()
#> Reading multiplexed.xlsx
#> Observations: 7
#> Variables: 7
#> $ sampleID    <fct> run_1_CAGTTATG, run_1_TTACCTCC, run_2_ATAGCCTT, run_2_C...
#> $ sampleName  <fct> sample 2, sample 1, sample 5, sample 4, sample 6, sampl...
#> $ description <fct> run 1, run 1, run 2, run 2, run 2, run 2, run 2
#> $ fileName    <fct> run1_R1.fastq.gz, run1_R1.fastq.gz, run2_R1.fastq.gz, r...
#> $ index       <fct> 18, 17, 14, 13, 15, 16, 12
#> $ sequence    <fct> CATAACTG, GGAGGTAA, AAGGCTAT, CTATTAAG, GAGCCTTA, TTATG...
#> $ revcomp     <fct> CAGTTATG, TTACCTCC, ATAGCCTT, CTTAATAG, TAAGGCTC, TCGCA...
